Hakeem Khaaliq (nke a na-akpọkwa Hakeem Abdul-Khaaliq) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta telivishọn, onye nduzi ihe nkiri, Onye na-ese foto, onye na'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi, onye na-ese eserese, na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịdị mmadụ

Tupu ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri na telivishọn ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta egwu, onye na-ebipụta egwu, onye nlekọta egwu na onye redio. N'afọ 1995, Khaaliq guzobere Radio Bums ma n'afọ 2010 ya na onye mmekọ ogologo oge Queen Muhammad Ali guzobere magazin Nation19 / APDTA.

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 30, afọ 2022 Sundance Film Festival nke MPAC's Hollywood Bureau na ISF gosipụtara na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Hakeem Khaaliq, Iman Zawahry, Sami Khan, Muna Deria, Queen Muhammad Ali, na Tarek Albaba
Sireen Sawaf duziri mkparịta ụka ahụ na okwu mmeghe nke Sue Obeidi, onye nduzi nke MPAC's Hollywood Bureau.
A mụrụ Khaaliq ma zụlite ya na South Central, Los Angeles, CA
Nna ya bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ọrụ gosipụtara na ihe nkiri The Spook Who Sat By The Door Khaaliq bụkwa nwa nwanne nwanyị nke onye na-ese foto a ma ama bụ Addison N
Scurlock. Khaaliq kwuru na enyi ezinụlọ ogologo oge Howard Bingham na onye nkuzi ya Jamel Shabazz bụ ndị kacha nwee mmetụta na foto

Na mbido ọrụ ya, Khaaliq malitere iduzi ma mepụta ihe nkiri (ihe nkiri mbụ ọ duziri bụ Snoop Dogg na Sean Puffy Combs), mana mmasị ya maka mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ime ihe mere ka ọ duzie ma mepụta fim na ihe ngosi na-elekwasị anya na nsogbu ụwa.
